    • Field Detail

      • projectFiles

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> projectFiles
        Normally, we would iterate all project directories and collect a list of files when requested. This is necessary to support virtual directories (file linking). Yet, we must also clean up zamia build errors when corresponing files are removed. And, because of eclipse bug 367021, we must keep an extra list of project files so that when link is deleted, we could locate its absolute path. Maps local project path => absolute path
